name: Chaos TD
description:
Come adventure into the land of CHAOS TD *Cue rock music*
We took the theme "Let there be Chaos" and merged a tower defence game with a chaotic carrying and dodging mechanic.

Created by a Developer and an Animator over roughly half the allotted time. Not bad, though :) maybe a tad ambitious for 4 days.

Dodge, place, purchase and sell towers in your way to glory. And if you're extra brave, you can attempt the post game mode ;)

We put a lot of hard work into this, would love for people to play it, give thoughts and feedback, if you do so I'll throw myself at your game and give it a good go.

IF ANYONE COMPLETES THE POST GAME MODE. LET. ME. KNOW!
